column4: I have ubuntu running on a USB stick. I want to copy it over to another USB. What command could I use that will make sure I get an exact copy with all hidden files and file permissions? Thanks..
you would need to copy with "dd" to get a bit for bit copy that would be bootable
that can only be done if stick2 is at least as large as stick1
Thanks. I'll check out the 'dd' command
